summary: Rebuilt project, cleared all caches, and restarted server. Cleared all Laravel caches (optimize, cache, config, route, view). Rebuilt frontend assets with npm run production. Restarted PHP development server on port 8000. Deleted all compiled Blade views. Server is running and responding correctly.
current_status: Project rebuilt successfully. All caches cleared. Server restarted on port 8000. Frontend assets compiled. Ready for testing. User should refresh browser to see all changes.
